body: Your foes flinch from the heat of your weapon, giving you an opportunity to slip past their defenses.
name: Blistering Feint
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Ifrits/New Racial Rules/Ifrit Feats/Blistering Feint

sections.body: You gain a +2 bonus on feint checks made while wielding a weapon that deals fire damage. Anytime you successfully feint a creature while using such a weapon, you may deal its fire damage to the enemy.
sections.name: Benefit
